name: Girls Dance VR
description: Girls invite you to their world. Play custom mode, become choreographer, chose girl, change her outfit, and the surrounding for the beautiful dancer. Join them and admire their beautiful movements in a dance. Sit comfortably in your armchair, put on VR googles and relax.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or better Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 (or equivalent) Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 (or equivalent) Storage: 1300 MB available space
